L2_gloss: to build, to construct, to erect, to inhabit, to be

to
Ku ba ndlopfu hi xibakele. ― To hit an elephant with a fist.
yonder, over there; remote demonstrative adverb.
you, you all; second-person plural pronoun.

marriage, wedding, matrimony
Vukati va kandza hi mbilu. ― A strong heart is necessary to make a marriage work.
he, she, him, her, it; third-person singular pronoun.
